body.p: To his Excellency the Governor of Ky

The undersigned the Jury who tried Thomas Cheshire under an Indictment against him and others for maliciously stabing Jno W Hendricks (at the present term of the Washington Circuit Court state to your Excellency that we felt constrained under the Law to find sd Chesire guilty of being present aiding and assisting in the wounding of Hendricks in sudden heat and passion and fixed his fine at fifty dollars and six months imprisonment in the County Jail We would further state that the case of Chesire is one in which it would be proper for the exercise of Executive Clemency wherefore we respectfully ask that you Remit the imprisonment and the fine so far as you can

D B Hughes
Jas Edelen
E B. Mills
Thos Colter
The. B Spalding
R Y McElroy
Stilh Thompson
Arthur McKenna
Patrick Sydelane
Thos. J. Montgomery
John T. Barker
H P Rabown } Jurors

Judge Andrew J. James
Frankfort Ky
